dc_title_s: Sketch of the battlefield of Logan's Cross Roads : and of the enemys [sic] fortified position at and opposite Mill Spring Ky. to which he retreated after his defeat, Major General George H. Thomas, Comdg. the U.S. Forces ; General G.B. Crittenden, Comdg. the Confed. Forces, Jan. 19th, 1862
dc_description_s: Scale 1:15,840; Scale 1:15,840; 2 maps on 1 sheet : hand colored; 34 x 29 cm, sheet 40 x 35 cm Thomas, George H.(George Henry), 1816-1870.
dc_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers.
dc_publisher_sm: Office of the Chief of Engineers
